item.title: Mandira Bedi 'put down her head and cried’ after ‘disrespect’ shown by cricket legends when she hosted 2003 World Cup - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Mandira Bedi recalls struggles as a cricket presenter during the 2003 World Cup

Date: Dec 22, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Mandira Bedi recalls her challenging early days as a cricket presenter during the 2003 World Cup, emphasizing the scrutiny she faced as a woman in a male-dominated space.

  • Mandira started her career in the early 2000s as a cricket presenter.
  • Sharing her experience on Kareena Kapoor's show, she discussed the challenges she faced.
  • Facing criticism and skepticism from cricket legends, she struggled initially.
  • Over time, she gained confidence and demanded respect during her presentations.
  • Only Mansoor Ali Khan Pataudi showed her respect out of the legends she worked with.
“At the end of every show, I would put my head down and cry. The legends on either side of me, I would ask them questions, and they just stared at me.”

Despite the initial disrespect, Mandira Bedi's journey highlights the evolving role of women in sports broadcasting.

item.title: Vanvaas Box Office Collection Day 2: 39% Jump But No Relief, Will Nana Patekar’s Film Land In The List Of The Lowest Grossing Films Of 2024? - Koimoi
item.description:
Vanvaas Box Office Collection Day 2: 39% Jump But No Relief

Publication Date: December 22, 2024 | Source: Koimoi

Nana Patekar and Utkarsh Sharma’s film Vanvaas has been struggling at the box office, earning only 1.75 crore in two days in India despite the weekend.

Key Points:

  • On the second day, the film’s earnings jumped 39% to 1.02 crore.
  • It opened as the 5th lowest grossing Hindi film in 2024.
  • The film needs to exceed the 5 crore mark to recover somewhat.
The film is already one of the lowest grossing films in Hindi at the box office in 2024.

The film's future looks bleak as Varun Dhawan's Baby John is set to release soon, potentially impacting its collections further.

item.title: Game Changer: Ram Charan is under pressure for multiple reasons - 123telugu
item.description:
Game Changer: Ram Charan Faces Pressure Ahead of Film Release

Published on Dec 22, 2024 1:30 pm IST

Ram Charan is ready with his new film Game Changer, set to hit the screens on January 10, 2024. Promotions are already underway in the US while the actor faces immense pressure to deliver a successful film after a long four-year hiatus.

  • Ram Charan's last film release was four years ago, raising expectations for his new project.
  • Fans are eagerly watching box office trends in light of the success of Pushpa 2.
  • Director Shankar and producer Dil Raju are also under pressure due to previous disappointments and heavy financial investments.
  • Charan plays a double role in the film, with Kiara Advani as the female lead.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 17: Baahubali 2 Is Dethroned After 7 Years, Allu Arjun's Biggie Is Now #1 Indian Film In History! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 17: Baahubali 2 Is Dethroned After 7 Years, Allu Arjun’s Biggie Is No

Publication Date: December 17, 2024

Source: Koimoi

In a historic moment for Indian cinema, Allu Arjun’s Pushpa 2 has surpassed the lifetime collection of Baahubali 2, becoming the highest-grossing Indian film at the box office just 17 days after its release.

  • Pushpa 2 opened with a collection of 179.25 crores and reached 736.35 crores over its first 8 days.
  • After a record-breaking second week of 270.40 crores, the total collection reached 1006.75 crores.
  • On Day 17, the film earned 26 crores, bringing the total to 1046.75 crores net in India.
“Records are meant to be broken,” said industry insiders following the film's record-breaking performance.

Pushpa 2's success reflects its massive popularity, setting a new benchmark in the Indian film industry.

item.title: AP Dhillon now shares ‘proof’ of Diljit Dosanjh blocking him on Instagram, says: 'Everyone will hate on me but…' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
AP Dhillon Shares Proof of Diljit Dosanjh Blocking Him on Instagram

Date: Dec 22, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

AP Dhillon has recently shared evidence on social media after Diljit Dosanjh denied blocking him on Instagram, posting recordings demonstrating his access to Diljit's profile.

  • Dhillon posted screen recordings showing a link sent by a fan, which initially resulted in an error.
  • Later, he shared another clip revealing he could view Diljit's profile, expressing humor about the situation.
  • Dhillon commented on the public perception and media games in the industry, emphasizing honesty in their work.
  • The dispute emerged as a part of a larger conversation during a concert where Dhillon jokingly asked Dosanjh to unblock him.
“I wasn't planning on saying s**t knowing everyone will hate on me anyways but at least we know what's real and what's not.” - AP Dhillon

This interaction highlights ongoing tensions and the dynamics of fame within the Punjabi music industry.

item.title: ‘We can bury anyone’: Private texts reveal Justin Baldoni's 'untraceable' plan to 'destroy' Blake Lively's reputation - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Private Messages Reveal Justin Baldoni's Alleged Plan Against Blake Lively

Published on: Dec 22, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Blake Lively has filed a lawsuit against co-star Justin Baldoni, alleging sexual harassment and a campaign to damage her reputation after she accused him of inappropriate conduct during filming.

  • Lively's lawsuit reveals private text messages suggesting Baldoni's intent to orchestrate a smear campaign.
  • Baldoni discussed plans with publicists and a crisis management expert about how to handle potential fallout from the lawsuit.
  • The lawsuit demands measures to ensure a respectful work environment, citing multiple inappropriate behaviors by Baldoni.
“We can’t write we will destroy her” - Melissa Nathan on plans discussed with Baldoni.

This situation has drawn significant media attention, highlighting the serious allegations of misconduct in the entertainment industry.

item.title: Varun Dhawan reveals 'wife of a very powerful man' broke into his house, was convinced he would leave his family for her - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Varun Dhawan reveals 'wife of a very powerful man' broke into his house, was convinced he would leave his family for her

Date: Dec 22, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Varun Dhawan recently shared a frightening incident where a woman, who he described as the 'wife of a very powerful man', was convinced that he would leave his family for her. She stalked him and even broke into his home.

  • Varun described the woman's belief that he desired her, despite being catfished.
  • The police were involved after the woman entered his residence without permission.
  • Varun reflected on inappropriate behavior he's experienced from fans, including being forcibly kissed.
  • He empathized with women, acknowledging that such unwanted advances must be worse for them.
  • Upcoming projects include the film "Baby John" on December 25, 2024.
“I can’t say what position… but a very powerful man, and she was being catfished.” - Varun Dhawan

This incident highlights the intense scrutiny public figures face and the challenges in their personal lives.

item.title: Game Changer: Ram Charan, SJ Suryah wow fans in Dallas with energetic dance moves - 123telugu
item.description:
Game Changer: Ram Charan, SJ Suryah wow fans in Dallas with energetic dance moves

Published on Dec 22, 2024 by Latest Telugu cinema news

In Dallas, Ram Charan and SJ Suryah electrified fans with a dynamic dance performance at the promotional event for their upcoming film, Game Changer. The film, directed by Shankar Shanmugam, is set for release on January 10, 2025.

  • Ram Charan is set to star in a dual role.
  • The film's soundtrack is gaining attention, especially the track “Ra Macha Macha”.
  • The event witnessed an enthusiastic crowd turnout.
  • Trailer release is anticipated soon.
  • Co-stars include Kiara Advani, Anjali, and others.
“It was amazing to see the crowd's reaction, and we had so much fun performing!” - Ram Charan

As excitement builds for the film's release, further updates will be shared shortly.

item.title: Pushpa 2 theatre stampede: Allu Arjun rejects Telangana CM’s claim that the actor stayed at theatre despite woman’s death - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 theatre stampede: Allu Arjun rejects Telangana CM’s claim that he stayed at theatre despite woman’s death

Publication Date: December 20, 2024  |  Source: Indian Express

The Pushpa 2 premiere in Hyderabad resulted in a tragic stampede, leading to a woman’s death and sparking a public feud between Telangana CM Revanth Reddy and actor Allu Arjun. The CM accused Arjun of disregarding police orders, while Arjun defended himself, stating he followed all regulations.

  • Incident occurred on December 4, 2024, during the Pushpa 2 premiere.
  • CM Revanth Reddy claimed Arjun stayed at the theatre after the death of a fan.
  • Allu Arjun refuted allegations, stating he acted as per police guidance.
  • The theatre’s management had denied police security prior to the event.
  • Allu Arjun offered to visit the injured boy but was advised against it by his legal team.
“There is a lot of misinformation that I behaved in a particular way (irresponsibly). These allegations are wrong. It’s humiliating and a character assassination.” - Allu Arjun

The controversy surrounding the incident highlights tensions between public figures and expectations during large events. The situation is under scrutiny as both parties continue to present their narratives.

item.title: 'Pushpa 2' box office collection day 16: The Allu Arjun starrer crosses Rs 1000 crore at the box office, - TOI Etimes
item.description:
'Pushpa 2' Surpasses Rs 1000 Crore at Box Office, Aiming to Break 'Baahubali 2' Record

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

Pushpa 2 is poised to become the highest-grossing Indian movie ever, aiming to surpass the current record held by 'Baahubali 2'. The film, starring Allu Arjun, has seen remarkable box office performance, particularly in Hindi.

  • The film has crossed Rs 1000 crore in total box office collection, reaching Rs 1004.35 crore.
  • Rs 632 crore of the total comes from the Hindi version while Rs 297.8 crore is from the Telugu version.
  • Pushpa 2 has performed better in Hindi compared to Telugu, which is notable for a regional film.
  • The film made Rs 13 crore on its 16th day at the box office.
  • Competition is expected from upcoming films such as 'Baby John' and 'Mufasa: The Lion King' during the holiday season.
The collection of 'Baahubali 2' is Rs 1040 crore, and it is expected that 'Pushpa 2' will cross this number in the coming week.

Expectations are high for 'Pushpa 2' with the Christmas and New Year holidays approaching, which could significantly boost its box office numbers.

item.title: 'Pushpa 2' box office collection day 17: The Allu Arjun film sees a jump on Saturday after crossing Rs 10 - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Pushpa 2 box office collection day 17: The Allu Arjun film sees a jump on Saturday after crossing Rs 1000 crores

Date: [Insert Publication Date Here] Source: [Insert Source Here]

After crossing the significant milestone of Rs 1000 crores, 'Pushpa 2' experiences a notable box office surge on its 17th day of release, highlighting its popularity and audience appeal.

  • The film achieved a remarkable box office collection, surpassing Rs 1000 crores.
  • On its 17th day, there was a noticeable uptick in ticket sales.
  • Audience reception has been largely positive, contributing to the film's continued commercial success.
"Pushpa 2's success is a testament to the strong fan base of Allu Arjun and the film's engaging storyline."

This ongoing success underscores the film's impact on the industry and sets a precedent for future releases.

item.title: Colleen Hoover lauds Blake Lively's ‘honesty’ after the actor slams Justin Baldoni with a lawsuit - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Colleen Hoover supports Blake Lively amid her sexual harassment lawsuit against Justin Baldoni.

Date: Dec 22, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Colleen Hoover, the author of It Ends With Us, has publicly backed Blake Lively following recent controversies with Justin Baldoni for sexual harassment and retaliation involving the film adaptation of her book.

  • Colleen Hoover praised Blake Lively's honesty and support via Instagram.
  • Lively filed a sexual harassment lawsuit against Baldoni on December 20, 2024.
  • The lawsuit accuses Baldoni of creating a hostile work environment and social manipulation.
  • Baldoni’s attorney denied the allegations, labeling them as false and outrageous.
  • Lively hopes her legal action will protect others who speak out against misconduct.
“Thank you for being exactly the human that you are. Never change. Never wilt.” - Colleen Hoover

The ongoing legal battle highlights important issues of accountability and harassment in Hollywood.

item.title: Justin Baldoni's Agency Cuts Ties With Him After Blake Lively's Sexual Harassment Lawsuit - Times Now
item.description:
Justin Baldoni's Agency Cuts Ties With Him After Blake Lively's Sexual Harassment Lawsuit

Date: December 21, 2023 Source: TNN

The rift between Blake Lively and Justin Baldoni has escalated as Baldoni has been dropped by his agency, WME, amid serious allegations of sexual harassment following a lawsuit filed by Lively accusing him of misconduct.

  • WME cuts ties with Baldoni amid allegations of sexual harassment.
  • Lively's lawsuit includes claims of creating a hostile work environment and a smear campaign.
  • The complaint details disturbing behavior including unwanted touching and inappropriate comments.
  • Baldoni is accused of entering Lively's trailer uninvited and making sexually charged remarks.
  • The allegations extend to Baldoni's production team as well.
  • Text messages reportedly show attempts to discredit Lively.
“The allegations are false and outrageous,” said Baldoni's legal team.

The lawsuit and subsequent agency drop mark a significant turn in the relationship between the two stars, whose work on It Ends With Us has faced backlash.

item.title: 'Pushpa 2' night show leads cops to make dramatic arrest of druglord in Nagpur - The Times of India
item.description:
Police Arrest Druglord After 'Pushpa 2' Night Show in Nagpur

Publication Date: October 2023; Source: Times of India

An exciting series of events unfolded in Nagpur when a night show of the movie 'Pushpa 2' led to the dramatic arrest of a notorious drug lord. Police utilized information from the film screening to track down and apprehend the suspect.

  • The arrest occurred shortly after the movie screening.
  • Authorities were tipped off about suspicious individuals linked to the drug lord's operations.
  • This incident highlights the intersection of popular culture and law enforcement efforts.
“Movies can sometimes lead to unexpected consequences, and in this instance, pop culture helped us make a significant arrest,” said a police spokesperson.

This event illustrates how cultural phenomena can influence real-world law enforcement and reflects the ongoing battle against drug-related crimes.

item.title: Telangana CM Revanth Reddy spits fire at Allu Arjun for 'inhuman act' after Sandhya theatre stampede - The Times of India
item.description:
Telangana CM Revanth Reddy spits fire at Allu Arjun for 'inhuman act' after Sandhya theatre stampede

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Times of India

Telangana Chief Minister Revanth Reddy has expressed strong criticism towards actor Allu Arjun following a tragic stampede at Sandhya theatre, labeling the actor's remarks on the incident as 'inhuman.'

  • The incident occurred during a crowded screening, leading to significant chaos.
  • Revanth Reddy's comments suggest a failure of empathy in the entertainment industry.
  • Public reactions have been mixed, with calls for accountability from various groups.
“This event highlights the need for compassion in our public figures,” said Reddy.

The reaction from CM Reddy underscores the broader implications of how celebrities respond to tragic events.

item.title: Shah Rukh Khan, Gauri Khan turn paparazzi into cheerleaders at Mumbai event; Katrina Kaif, Suhana Khan seen too. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Shah Rukh Khan, Gauri Khan Turn Paparazzi into Cheerleaders at Mumbai Event

Date: Dec 22, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Shah Rukh Khan and Gauri Khan were among the many celebrities who attended a festive gathering at Mumbai’s Nita Mukesh Ambani Cultural Centre, where they charmed the paparazzi.

  • Shah Rukh and Gauri rocked matching black outfits.
  • They received cheers from fans upon arriving at the event.
  • Other attendees included Katrina Kaif, Madhuri Dixit, and Suhana Khan.
  • Shah Rukh Khan is set to appear in the upcoming film King.
  • Shahid Kapoor's upcoming film Deva is scheduled for release on February 14, 2025.
“After posing for the paparazzi, Shah Rukh Khan smiled, blew a kiss, and flashed the thumbs-up sign.”

This event highlighted the glamorous side of Bollywood and showcased the camaraderie among its stars.

item.title: Game Changer: Dhop song release time pushed back - 123telugu
item.description:
Game Changer: Dhop Song Release Time Pushed Back

Published on: Dec 22, 2024 8:28 am IST

Global star Ram Charan is set to appear in a dual role in his upcoming political drama Game Changer, directed by Shankar Shanmugam. Kiara Advani plays the female lead in this highly anticipated film, which is scheduled for release on January 10, 2025, in all major Indian languages.

  • The film's promotional events are currently taking place in Dallas, where Ram Charan is engaging with fans.
  • The Dhop song, composed by popular music director Thaman, was initially scheduled for release at 8:20 AM but has been delayed to 9:30 AM.
  • Despite the delay, fans anticipate that the track will be a major hit.
  • Game Changer features a prominent cast including SJ Suryah, Srikanth, Anjali, and others.
  • Produced by Dil Raju under the Sri Venkateswara Creations banner, the film comes with high budget expectations.
“The Dhop song will become a chartbuster despite the wait.”

This delay in the song release adds to the excitement surrounding the film's premiere, reflecting the high anticipation among fans for Game Changer.

item.title: Jennifer Lopez ‘struggles’ being a single mom following her split with Ben Affleck - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Jennifer Lopez discusses the challenges of raising her twins after her split from Ben Affleck.

Date: Dec 22, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

In a recent interview with British Vogue, Jennifer Lopez opened up about her struggles as a single mother of her 16-year-old twins, Emme and Max, following her split from Ben Affleck. She emphasized her experience and feelings of vulnerability amidst public scrutiny.

  • Lopez describes parenting as a “beautiful, challenging blessing.”
  • She acknowledges her aim to always put forward a strong front for her children despite personal struggles.
  • The actress addresses her own moments of self-doubt as a single parent.
  • Her role in the film 'Unstoppable' has provided her with a sense of healing and reflection.
  • Lopez emphasizes that “all you need is really one good parent to love you.”
“Being a parent [is] the hardest job that anyone could ever have.”

Jennifer Lopez's insights reveal the complexities and emotional depths of single parenthood, showing that even amidst fame, the challenges of raising children remain relatable.

item.title: Whole of Bollywood turns up in fancy outfits for Ambani party: Shah Rukh, Katrina, Madhuri join Nita Ambani and family - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Whole of Bollywood turns up in fancy outfits for Ambani party: Shah Rukh, Katrina, Madhuri join Nita Ambani and family

Date: Dec 22, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Bollywood celebrities showcased their fashion sense at the NMACC Arts Cafe event in Mumbai, attending in elegant outfits and making style statements.

  • Attendees included Shah Rukh Khan, Katrina Kaif, Madhuri Dixit, and many more.
  • Nita Ambani wowed in a white and black suit, while Shloka Ambani dazzled in a peach off-the-shoulder dress.
  • Katrina Kaif wore a simple yet elegant Toni Maticevski dress, contrasted by Ananya Panday's dramatic Gaurav Gupta mini dress.
  • Other stars included Gauri Khan, Vidya Balan, and the Kapoor sisters, all impressively dressed.
  • The event highlighted not just celebrity glamour but also personal styles that resonated with festive themes.
"Nothing says Christmas and New Year's Eve like the Kapoor sister's party dresses!"

This gathering showcases the fusion of high fashion and celebrity culture, solidifying the Ambani family's influence in the industry.

item.title: Diljit Dosanjh fires back at AP Dhillon after he claims singer blocked him on Instagram: 'Mere pange...' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Diljit Dosanjh fires back at AP Dhillon after he claims singer blocked him on Instagram: 'Mere pange...'

Publication Date: Dec 22, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

Diljit Dosanjh recently addressed claims by fellow artist AP Dhillon about being blocked on Instagram during a concert. The back-and-forth highlights their relationship and the dynamics within the Punjabi music industry.

  • Diljit gave a shout-out to AP Dhillon and Karan Aujla during his concert in Indore.
  • AP Dhillon urged Diljit to unblock him on Instagram during his own performance in Chandigarh.
  • Diljit took to Instagram to clarify that he never blocked AP Dhillon, suggesting possible misunderstandings.
  • Diljit is currently on his Dil-Luminati India Tour, which started in October and will end in December.
  • AP Dhillon concluded his Brownprint Tour before traveling to Chandigarh.
“Mere pange sarkaaran naal ho sakde aa....kalaakaran naal ni (My issues could be with the government…not with the artists).” - Diljit Dosanjh

This ongoing exchange showcases the inter-artist dynamics and the ongoing evolution of independent music in India, emphasizing the importance of collaboration and communication.

item.title: Justin Baldoni rubbishes Blake Lively's 'shameful' sexual harassment claim: Desperate attempt to fix negative reputation - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Justin Baldoni Responds to Blake Lively's Sexual Harassment Allegations

Publication Date: Dec 22, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Justin Baldoni has reacted strongly to allegations made by his co-star, Blake Lively, who has sued him for sexual harassment and claimed he attempted to undermine her reputation.

  • Baldoni stated the allegations are a 'desperate attempt' to fix Lively's negative reputation.
  • His lawyer called the claims 'categorically false' and 'shameful'.
  • Freedman, Baldoni's attorney, mentioned allegations of a smear campaign against Lively orchestrated by Baldoni.
  • Lively’s lawsuit alleges a hostile work environment and multiple unwanted actions during production.
  • Specific demands in the lawsuit include prohibitions on discussing sensitive personal topics and showing explicit materials.
“The accusations are a desperate attempt to 'fix' her negative reputation which was garnered from her own remarks and actions…” - Bryan Freedman, Baldoni’s lawyer.

This situation has garnered significant attention in the entertainment industry, with implications for both actors’ careers moving forward.

item.title: Diljit Dosanjh SLAMS AP Dhillon After Latter Claims He's Has Blocked Him: 'My Issues Can Be With...' - News18
item.description: No summary available for this article. Click the link to read more.

item.title: Dharmendra had once said his sons Sunny Deol and Bobby Deol are too innocent, they don't have any affairs - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Dharmendra had once said his sons Sunny Deol and Bobby Deol are too innocent, they don't have any affairs, reveals 'Gadar 2' director Anil Sharma: 'Inke Chakkar hi nahi chalte'

Publication Date: Unknown | Source: Unknown

Anil Sharma, the director of 'Gadar 2', shares insights about Dharmendra's perspective on his sons, Sunny and Bobby Deol, emphasizing their innocence regarding relationships.

  • Anil Sharma reveals Dharmendra's view on his sons' romantic lives.
  • He quotes Dharmendra saying, 'Inke Chakkar hi nahi chalte', implying they are not involved in affairs.
  • The article highlights the familial relationship and public perception of the Deol brothers.
"Inke Chakkar hi nahi chalte" - Dharmendra on his sons' innocence.

This viewpoint provides an interesting glimpse into the Deol family's dynamic, reflecting on their perceived innocence amidst public speculation.
